name: I LOVE HUE.
description: What is the most universal experience between all humans? Fear? Possibly, but what about love? Love is the glue that holds our separate societies together. In "I LOVE HUE.", a simple color pun now becomes a meta statement on color and love. It implies that love has no bounds; it is on a double spectrum. What's even more special than a rainbow? A double rainbow! 1. The first spectrum here is the range of love; love is love no matter who you love. Period. No one should have the authority to tell you who you can love or who you can be loved by. No one should shame you because of who you love or who you are love by. 2. The second spectrum here is quite literal, it is the spectrum of colors (red to violet) that are created expressly from the stacked I LOVE YOU. sentences on the image. They wind up complimenting each other in a meta type of conversation. Do you love me?  As a human, I love you. As an artist, I love hue.
